job.title: Software Engineer [RWF]
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtImportant Noteltstronggt During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTechnologyltstronggt sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtThis position will focus on frontend web development within the Wells Fargo Home Lending Technology team Qualified candidates will be experts in the areas of HTML CSS JavaScript as well as fluent in clientside technologies such as Angular preferred React Vue SASS or equivalent Will act in a lead technical role providing technical guidance and consultation with application teams clients and Engineering Managers for their technology domain environments Design code test debug and document programs using Agile development practices Provides the strategy and design for projects associated with their technology domain Leads projects and manages the work of less experienced staff Assures quality security and compliance requirements are met for supported technology domain Leads projects and as an escalation point provides guidance and direction to less experienced staff in resolution of highly complex technical problems Works within a scrum team to ensure team successltbrgtltbrgtRWFltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligt3 years of Agile experienceltligtltligt3 years of XML Extensible Markup Language experienceltligtltligt5 years of net experienceltligtltligt5 years of C experienceltligtltligt5 years of Object Oriented experienceltligtltligt5 years of SQL experienceltligtltligt3  years of AngularJS experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligt3 years of UI User Interface experienceltligtltligt3 years of Autosys experienceltligtltligt3 years of SQL Server Integration Services SSIS experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOther Desired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtSalary Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActltbrgtltbrgtRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenltbrgtltbrgtWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer
